title: Tucker – Ein Mann und sein Traum (USA_/Trailer)
corrected: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
notes: 1988 Francis Ford Coppola biopic with Jeff Bridges as Preston Tucker, innovative 1940s car designer vs Detroit establishment - distinctive American dream narrative

title: Tür der Versuchung
notes: 2004 Tod Williams adaptation of John Irving novel with Jeff Bridges, Kim Basinger about writer's disintegrating marriage - distinctive literary adaptation

title: Twenty nine Palms
notes: 2003 Bruno Dumont provocative slow cinema about couple in California desert - distinctive minimalist European art film

title: Überfall der teuflischen Bestien (KAN/USA´76_/TR)
notes: 1977 David Cronenberg body horror with Marilyn Chambers as woman spreading rabies-like infection after experimental surgery - distinctive early Cronenberg

title: Unauffällige Mr. Crane (Der)
notes: 2001 Coen Brothers black-and-white neo-noir with Billy Bob Thornton as laconic 1940s barber in blackmail scheme - distinctive cinematography Roger Deakins

title: Und trotzdem ist es meine Familie (USA '2011)
notes: 2011 Sam Levinson family dysfunction drama with Ellen Barkin, Kate Bosworth at dysfunctional wedding - distinctive ensemble character study

title: Unsere wunderbaren Jahre (1-3_CZ/D ´2020)
notes: 2020 German TV miniseries about three generations in post-war Germany 1948-1981 - distinctive period family saga

title: Unterleuten (1-3_D ´2020)
notes: 2020 German TV miniseries based on Juli Zeh novel about village conflicts over wind farm - distinctive contemporary rural drama
